      • Bookie

        public Bookie(java.lang.String bookieID,
              int bookiePort)
        Construct a new bookie instance, including to create and start an associated JSON-RPC server.
        Parameters:
        bookieID - unique human-readable name for the bookie
        bookiePort - port number where the associated JSON-RPC server shall listen on

      • createNewGamblerConnection

        public void createNewGamblerConnection(java.lang.String gamblerID,
                                       java.lang.String gamblerIP,
                                       int gamblerPort)
        Create a new connection with some gambler.
        Parameters:
        gamblerID - gambler-id of the gambler to connect with
        gamblerIP - IP address of the gambler's JSON-RPC server
        gamblerPort - port number the gambler's JSON-RPC server listens on

      • getGamblerConnection

        public GamblerConnection getGamblerConnection(java.lang.String gamblerID)
        Returns the GamblerConnection associated with the specified gambler.
        Parameters:
        gamblerID - gambler-id of the remote gambler
        Returns:
        The GamblerConnection associated with the specified gambler

      • startBetPhase

        public void startBetPhase(java.lang.String teamA,
                          float oddsA,
                          java.lang.String teamB,
                          float oddsB,
                          int limit)
        Starts a new match between two teams, setting their initial odds, and the limit on the total wager for this match. A unique Match-ID will be created. All connected gamblers are informed about the start of that new match, including all its parameters, i.e. the Match-ID, the participating teams, their odds, and the limit. From this point on, the bookie starts accepting bets for that match.
        Parameters:
        teamA - name of the first team
        oddsA - odds if first team wins
        teamB - name of the second team
        oddsB - odds if second team wins
        limit - total wager for this match

      • setOdds

        public void setOdds(int matchID,
                    java.lang.String team,
                    float newOdds)
        Changes the odds for a team in a running match, and notifies all connected gamblers.
        Parameters:
        matchID - id of the match for which to change the odds
        team - name of the team for which to change odds
        newOdds - new odds for that team

      • endBetPhase

        public void endBetPhase(int matchID,
                        java.lang.String winningTeam)
        Terminates a match, determining the team that won. All connected gamblers are informed about the outcome. The payouts are calculated and transferred to the winners.
        Parameters:
        matchID - id of the terminated match
        winningTeam - name of the team that won that match

      • showBets

        public void showBets()
        Shows a list of all open bets placed with this bookie.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Configure and launch a bookie instance.
        Parameters:
        args - command-line arguments (unused)
